Title: Over 80 per cent of non-APC lawmakers planning defection – Bamidele
Summary: Senate Majority Leader Opeyemi Bamidele said over 80 per cent of federal lawmakers from opposition parties are planning to defect to the All Progressives Congress (APC) He made the statement on Friday during the commissioning of multiple projects .

Title: Nigeria’s indigenous firm seals deal to develop Tanzania’s oil block
Summary: Nigeria’s FIRST Exploration & Petroleum Development Company (FIRST E&P) has entered into a strategic agreement with the Tanzania Petroleum Development Corporation (TPDC) to assess and potentially develop the Mnazi Bay North Block, a gas-rich area in southern Tanzania .

Title: Dangote upgrades refinery, targets 700,000bpd capacity
Summary: The Dangote Petroleum Refinery in Lagos is undergoing modifications to increase its nameplate capacity from 650,000 to 700,000bpd . The refinery is currently undergoing modifications .

Title: Paul Onuachu out for up to four weeks with ankle injury
Summary: Trabzonspor striker Paul Onuachu out for up to four weeks with ankle injury . The 31-year-old sustained the injury during a pre-season match against Araz Nakhchivan .

Title: Andy Byron resigns as Astronomer CEO over kiss cam scandal
Summary: Andy Byron, Chief Executive Officer of New York-based tech company Astronomer, has stepped down following the emergence of a viral video showing him in a compromising moment with a colleague during a Coldplay concert in Massachusetts . In a statement released, Byron resigned as CEO of Astronomer .

Title: Why Nigeria doesn’t need more states – Gov Otti
Summary: Governor of Abia State, Dr. Alex Otti has said that Nigeria doesn't need additional states because the existing ones lack viability for economic self-sustainability . Dr. Otti said that existing states lack viability .

Title: After 7 years, NDLEA arrests wanted drug kingpin with 11.6kg cocaine, meth
Summary: A wanted 60-year-old drug kingpin, Okpara Paul Chigozie, was arrested on Sunday . He had been evading the long arm of the law for seven years . NDLEA operatives arrested him with 11.6kg cocaine, meth and 11.4kg methamphetamine .

Title: WAFCON: Super Falcons semi-final opponent confirmed
Summary: South Africa have sealed their place in the semi-finals of the 2024 Women’s Africa Cup of Nations . They will now face arch-rivals Nigeria in a highly anticipated clash at the Stade Larbi Zaouli in Casablanca, Morocco .

Title: Our students shouldn’t be victimized for leadership failures — Peter Obi
Summary: Former Labour Party presidential candidate, Peter Obi, has called on Nigerian leaders at all levels to prioritize education and the welfare of citizens . He warned that students should not be made to suffer the consequences of leadership failures .

Title: Police dismantle kidnappers’ hideout, rescue 3 victims in Ogu
Summary: Operatives of the Ogun State Police Command have dismantled a kidnapper's hideout . They rescued three victims in the Obafemi Owode local government area of the state .
